bibl.title: Medicine and Cure in Posidippus' Iamatika.
with the Assistance of A. AMBÜHL, Nature and Science in Hellenistic Poetry
bibl.author: KARANIKA, Andromache

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Iamatika poem 95, the gaze of a dying man and a look that kills. - 3. Magical subtext and science. - 4. Disease and votive offerings in the Iamatika. - 5. Symmetry and time in disease and cure. - 6. Conclusion: gaze illusions, gaze allusions.
KARANIKA Andromache, Medicine and Cure in Posidippus' Iamatika.
M.A. HARDER, R.F. REGTUIT and G.C. WAKKER (Edd.), with the Assistance of A. AMBÜHL, Nature and Science in Hellenistic Poetry = Hellenistica Groningana. 15 (Leuven, 2009) pp. 41-56.
